attributes.action: Transport regulation for private and Hackney set towns border
attributes.additional_details: The drivers want have licence from other towns crash our income, they haven't knowledge about town and we need this borders to be in place .
attributes.background:
I would like to protect the taxi drivers from each city of uk by set border limits.
For example I live and work  in Merseyside like a private hire driver. Over here and not just here in Merseyside comes drivers from other towns working here. Please protect us and our family

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open which you might like to sign:

Require taxis and private hire vehicles be licensed in the areas they operate
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636443
